mcq.statement: Which statement about one mole of metal is always correct? It has the same mass as 1 mole of carbon atoms., It is liberated by 1 mole electrons., It contains the same number of atoms as 1 mole of hydrogen atoms., It contains the same number of atoms as 1/2 mole of C¹².

options.a: It has the same mass as 1 mole of carbon atoms.
options.b: It is liberated by 1 mole electrons.
options.c: It contains the same number of atoms as 1 mole of hydrogen atoms.
options.d: It contains the same number of atoms as 1/2 mole of C¹².
